webscript.description:
Get a collection of people in the current network stored in the repository. This can optionally be filtered according to a given filter query string.

Sample query parameters and their meanings

  • skipCount the number of people to skip
  • maxItems the number of people to return in the page
  • filter=fred = people whose first names, last names or usernames start with 'fred'.
  • sortBy : 'lastName' or 'firstName'
  • internal not specified = all people visible on this tenant.
  • internal = true (case-sensitive) = all people who are internal on this tenant.
  • internal = false = all people who are external on this tenant.
  • networkAdmin = true (case-sensitive) = all people who are network admins on this tenant.

The query params can be used together. Note: the results are post filtered, which means that the pages may be truncated. Until we get aspect support in the canned queries, there isn't much we can do about that.
